attributes.action: abide by his principals-trust his instinctive judgement-keep his faith-follow his heart
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Americans are supportive of his tenure. All of my associates and media professional friends cheer his position . I for one am encouraged . Good luck and God's blessings be with you every day.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
